name: Torturer
text: +3 Card, Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

+1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action.

text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

text: +1 Card, +1 Action, Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

name: Possession
text:
The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him.
Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

name: Black Market
text:
+2 Coins, Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.
(Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card not in the supply.).

name: Potion
text: Worth 1 Potion.

name: Plan
text: Move your Trashing token to an Action supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

name: Duchy
text: 3 Victory

name: Silk Road
text: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

name: Ghost Ship
text: +2 Card, Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

name: Apprentice
text:
+1 Action
Trash a card from your hand.
+1 Card per Coin it costs.
+2 Cards if it has Potion in its cost.

name: Distant Lands
text: Put this on your Tavern mat.<hr>Worth 4 Victory if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0 Victory).

name: City
text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.

name: Moat
text: +2 Cards, When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

name: Sir Martin
text:
+2 Buys
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Borrow
text:
+1 Buy
Once per turn: If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +1 Coin.

name: Masterpiece
text: 1 Coin<hr>When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per 1 Coin you overpaid.

name: Fortress
text: +1 Card, +2 Actions<hr>When you trash this, put it into your hand.

name: Mission
text: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.

name: Walled Village
text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Menagerie
text:
+1 Action
Reveal your hand.
If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards.
Otherwise, +1 Card.

name: Artificer
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Discard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin per card discarded, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Cache
text: Worth 3 Coins<hr>When you gain this, gain two Coppers.

name: Training
text: Move your +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Coin).

name: Cutpurse
text: +2 Coins, Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

name: Witch
text: +2 Cards, Each other player gains a Curse card.

name: Graverobber
text: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

name: Relic
text:
2 Coins
When you play this, each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

name: Jack of all Trades
text:
Gain a Silver.
Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back.
Draw until you have 5 cards in hand.
You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

name: Golem
text:
Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards.
Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

name: Crossroads
text:
Reveal your hand.
+1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

name: Oracle
text:
Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.
+2 Cards

name: Duplicate
text: Put this on your Tavern mat.<hr>When you gain a card costing up to 6 Coins, you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.

name: Advisor
text:
+1 Action
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

name: Feast
text: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

name: Farming Village
text:
+2 Actions
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

name: Duke
text: Worth 1 Victory per Duchy you have.

name: Loan
text:
Worth 1 Coin.
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

name: Sir Michael
text:
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Gold
text: 3 Coins.

name: Navigator
text: +2 Coins, Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Merchant Ship
text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

name: Dame Josephine
text:
2 Victory
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Fortune Teller
text:
+2 Coins
Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

name: Platinum
text: 5 Coins.

name: Transmogrify
text:
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin more than it, and put that card into your hand.

name: Contraband
text:
Worth 3 Coins.
+1 Buy
When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

name: Treasure Trove
text:
2 Coins
When you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.

name: Swamp Hag
text:
Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a Curse.
At the start of your next turn:
+3 Coins

name: Hermit
text: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.<hr>When you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

name: Magpie
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

name: Goons
text:
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 <VP>.

name: Bridge Troll
text:
Each other player takes his -1 Coin token. Now and at the start of your next turn:
+1 Buy
While this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less on your turns, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Miser
text: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +1 Coin per Copper on your Tavern mat.

name: Hunting Grounds
text: +4 Cards<hr>When you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

name: Treasure Hunter
text:
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Gain a Silver per card the player to your right gained in his last turn.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Poor House
text:
+4 Coins
Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.

name: Pirate Ship
text: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

name: Copper
text: 1 Coin.

name: Remodel
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Warrior
text:
+2 Cards
For each Traveller you have in play (including this), each other player discards the top card of his deck and trashes it if it costs 3 Coins or 4 Coins.
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Travelling Fair
text:
+2 Buys
When you gain a card this turn, you may put it on top of your deck.

name: Nomad Camp
text:
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

name: Bridge
text: +1 Buy, +1 Coin. All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Gold
text: 3 Coins

name: Secret Chamber
text: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Tournament
text:
+1 Action
Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card +1 Coin.

name: Pathfinding
text: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).

name: Ruined Market
text: +1 Buy

name: Scheme
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

name: Fishing Village
text: +2 Actions, +1 Coin, At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

name: Remake
text: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

name: Necropolis
text: +2 Actions

name: Peddler
text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin<hr>During your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coins.

name: Tribute
text: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an... Action Card, +2 Actions; Treasure Card, +2 Coins; Victory Card, +2 Cards.

name: Sea Hag
text: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

name: Salvager
text: +1 Buy, Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

name: Pawn
text: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

name: Haven
text: +1 Card, +1 Action, Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

name: Saboteur
text: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

name: Bishop
text:
+1 Coin
+1 <VP>
Trash a card from your hand. +<VP> equal to half its cost in Coins, rounded down.
Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

name: Philosopher's Stone
text:
When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.
Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

name: Mercenary
text: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Storyteller
text:
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Play up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Pay all of your Coins; +1 Card per Coin paid.

name: Ambassador
text: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Farmland
text: 2 VP<hr>When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

name: Rogue
text:
+2 Coins
If there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

name: Vault
text:
+2 Cards
Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded.
Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

name: Bazaar
text: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.

name: Herbalist
text:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin
When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

name: Band of Misfits
text:
Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose.
This is that card until it leaves play.

name: Wharf
text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.

name: Soothsayer
text: Gain a gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.

name: Procession
text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

name: Mystic
text:
+1 Action, +2 Coins
Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

name: Haggler
text: +2 Coins<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

name: Sage
text:
+1 Action
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Seaway
text: Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).

name: Pearl Diver
text: +1 Card, +1 Action, Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

name: Haunted Woods
text:
Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he puts his hand on top of his deck in any order.
At the start of your next turn:
+3 Cards

name: Curse
text: -1 Victory.

name: Treasure Map
text: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Talisman
text: Worth 1 Coin.<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

name: Abandoned Mine
text: +1 Coin

name: Trade
text: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.

name: Peasant
text:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.

name: Vineyard
text: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Feodum
text: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Silvers in your deck (round down).<hr>When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

name: Page
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.

name: Develop
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Stonemason
text:
Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.
When you buy this, you may overpay for it.
If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

name: Minion
text: +1 Action, Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

name: Nobles
text: 2 Victory, Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.

name: Scavenger
text:
+1 Coins
You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

name: Province
text: 6 Victory

name: Harvest
text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

name: Estate
text: 1 Victory

name: Estate
text: 1 Victory.

name: Duchy
text: 3 Victory.

name: Butcher
text: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

name: Scouting Party
text:
+1 Buy
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 of them and put the rest back in any order.

name: Duchess
text:
+2 Coins
Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.
In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

name: Pillage
text:
Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose.
Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Courtyard
text: +3 Card, Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Journeyman
text: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Native Village
text:
+2 Actions, Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.

You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.
